sentence.text: Plant homeo domain finger protein 8 (PHF8), as an oncogene, has been highlighted in cancer development and progression.
The results demonstrated that the expression of PHF8 was significantly increased in tumor tissues from patients with CRC and was correlated with tumor‑node‑metastasis stage.
In vitro and in vivo experiments revealed that PHF8 accelerated cancer cell growth and migration, confirming the oncogenic role of PHF8 in human CRC.
